answerText: Antic Hay[10] This English author of Antic Hay is better known for writing about John the Savage and Mustapha Mond in Brave New World.
heading: Penn Bowl |2012 | Editors Packet 6 | 18 | Literature | British | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: The protagonist of this novel invents his own namesake Patent Small-Clothes. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Theodore Gumbril uses a fake beard to disguise himself as "The Complete Man" when approaching women.
